displayName.text: NY SPORTS 4 KIDS William T. Harris School

formattedAddress: 320 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 320 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: We couldn't be happier with our experience at NY Sports 4 Kids! Our daughter absolutely loves it, and it has become the highlight of her week. Wafa has created a warm and supportive atmosphere that has not only taught our little one critical swim skills but has also instilled a genuine love for the water. Her newfound enthusiasm even carries over to bath time at home! The use of familiar kids' songs during lessons is a brilliant touch, making her feel comfortable and engaged while enjoying every moment with her parents in the water. We're so grateful for the positive impact NY Sports 4 Kids has in creating such a nurturing environment for young swimmers!

originalText.text: We started swim lessons with our son when he was 9m and ever session since has been a blast. Coach Wafa creates an environment where kids can learn to have fun and be safe in the water right from the beginning. Swim class with NY Sports 4 Kids the highlight of our son's week!

text.text: We started swim lessons with our son when he was 9m and ever session since has been a blast. Coach Wafa creates an environment where kids can learn to have fun and be safe in the water right from the beginning. Swim class with NY Sports 4 Kids the highlight of our son's week!

originalText.text: My wife and I take our 8th month old son to the water angels class at NY Sports 4 Kids at PS11. The quality of the instructor is fantastic- he has fun drills and exercises, and is incredibly kind and supportive to parents and children alike. He is also the father of 5 children so he really understands the parents' perspective. We have already registered for the next session. I actually taught this class 20 years ago and thought wow this instructor is way better than I was. I highly recommend it for everyone.

originalText.text: Great swim lesson for my 4 year old!  She has always been comfortable in water but is now learning the steps to swim. The instructors are patient and Wafa is great. Within a few weeks my daughter is confidently swimming and floating.

text.text: Great swim lesson for my 4 year old!  She has always been comfortable in water but is now learning the steps to swim. The instructors are patient and Wafa is great. Within a few weeks my daughter is confidently swimming and floating.

originalText.text: We love NY sports 4 kids. Our little one has been attending for well over a year and loves it. I highly recommend as it only encourages bravery and body awareness. Wafa is also helpful in transitioning babies (and parents) to get comfortable with the water and gave me a lot of confidence earlier on.
